front.title: Guidelines for Using the Privacy Mechanism for SIP

abstract.t: This is an informational document that provides guidelines for using the privacy mechanism for Session Initiation Protocol (SIP), that is specified in RFC 3323 and subsequently extended in RFCs 3325 and 4244. It is intended to clarify the handling of the target SIP headers/parameters and SDP parameters for each of the privacy header values (priv-values).
